comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The arrival at Dar es Salaam of the British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, on 25 March 1961, to attend the Tanganyika Constitutional Conference. Greeted by the Chief Minister, Mr Julius K Nyerere.  Mrs Macleod behind her husband's head,  and behind her the Governor of Tanganyika, Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG. Behind Mr Nyerere is the Governor's Private Secretary, Mr I H Norton.
